name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Field Engineer with a strong background in problem-solving and customer service, bringing 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proven expertise in fault finding and repairs, ensuring optimal system performance and reliability, while effectively addressing complex issues. Experienced in utilizing **Salesforce** for enhanced customer relationship management. Demonstrated ability to communicate technical concepts clearly, ensuring customer satisfaction and successful project delivery. Adept at leveraging a diverse tech stack, including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside frameworks and tools like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in developing AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. A solid foundation in MLOps, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
